data.text:
Continuing on to the next segment, we have this! 
A spotlight on the Twinkle Series "Cool★Spot"!
data.name: Color Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Continuing on to the next segment, we have this! 
<story>A spotlight on the Twinkle Series "Cool★Spot"!

data.text:
Soon the battle for the Classic races will begin, and for this 
year's participants, the number of people calling them the 
"Golden Generation" has been increasing!
data.name: Color Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Soon the battle for the Classic races will begin, and for this 
<story>year's participants, the number of people calling them the 
<story>"Golden Generation" has been increasing!

data.text:
Among those gaining attention, outwardly with 
an aloof nature, but conversely, using her cunning 
escape to control the race, Seiun Sky!
data.name: Color Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Among those gaining attention, outwardly with 
<story>an aloof nature, but conversely, using her cunning 
<story>escape to control the race, Seiun Sky!

data.text:
By crafting her own pace, she leads her opponents around by the 
nose, among her fans she's been given the title of "Trickster"!
data.name: Color Commentator
data.processed:
<story>By crafting her own pace, she leads her opponents around by the 
<story>nose, among her fans she's been given the title of "Trickster"!

data.text:
Continuing on, having achieved 3 consecutive wins, 
including a Major, without breaking a sweat is King Halo!
data.name: Color Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Continuing on, having achieved 3 consecutive wins, 
<story>including a Major, without breaking a sweat is King Halo!

data.text:
The daughter of a reknowned family, living up to expectations, 
she's displayed a magnificent racing style! The number of G1 
titles she'll obtain is already the talk of the town!
data.name: Color Commentator
data.processed:
<story>The daughter of a reknowned family, living up to expectations, 
<story>she's displayed a magnificent racing style! The number of G1 
<story>titles she'll obtain is already the talk of the town!

data.text:
Gallantly flying in from America, the way she snatches away 
victories is certainly like a condor! The as yet undefeated 
"Seabird" El Condor Pasa!
data.name: Color Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Gallantly flying in from America, the way she snatches away 
<story>victories is certainly like a condor! The as yet undefeated 
<story>"Seabird" El Condor Pasa!

data.text:
"I'll prove I'm the world's strongest" are her words, 
and she's shown that she's not all talk! With her striking 
run at her debut match, she's gained a lot of fans!
data.name: Color Commentator
data.processed:
<story>"I'll prove I'm the world's strongest" are her words, 
<story>and she's shown that she's not all talk! With her striking 
<story>run at her debut match, she's gained a lot of fans!

data.text:
Also from America we have one more Uma 
Musume, Grass Wonder! While she appears to be a Yamato 
Nadeshiko, what lies within is certainly a samurai spirit!
data.name: Color Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Also from America we have one more Uma 
<story>Musume, Grass Wonder! While she appears to be a Yamato 
<story>Nadeshiko, what lies within is certainly a samurai spirit!

data.text:
The undefeated Junior champion of the [Asahi Hai FS] 
with a record-breaking victory! With her overwhelming race 
presence, the title of "Monster" has been given to her!
data.name: Color Commentator
data.processed:
<story>The undefeated Junior champion of the [Asahi Hai FS] 
<story>with a record-breaking victory! With her overwhelming race 
<story>presence, the title of "Monster" has been given to her!

data.text:
And the last one we'll introduce, carrying a big dream, 
coming to the capital all the way from Hokkaido, Special Week!
data.name: Color Commentator
data.processed:
<story>And the last one we'll introduce, carrying a big dream, 
<story>coming to the capital all the way from Hokkaido, Special Week!

data.text:
She immediately demonstrated the abilities that brought her into 
Tracen Academy in her debut race! Possibly becoming a part of 
the "Golden Generation" has brought her a lot of attention!
data.name: Color Commentator
data.processed:
<story>She immediately demonstrated the abilities that brought her into 
<story>Tracen Academy in her debut race! Possibly becoming a part of 
<story>the "Golden Generation" has brought her a lot of attention!

data.text:
How will she do in her upcoming second race?! 
What kind of races will we become witness to?!
data.name: Color Commentator
data.processed:
<story>How will she do in her upcoming second race?! 
<story>What kind of races will we become witness to?!

data.text: I'll be off- to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>I'll be off- to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

data.text: I LOOOOOST!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>I LOOOOOST!!

data.text:
Uwooooo～h! It's frustrating isn't it～?! 
I understand, that bitter feeling～!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Uwooooo～h! It's frustrating isn't it～?! 
<story>I understand, that bitter feeling～!

data.text:
To become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"― to live up to that dream, 
Special Week had come all the way to Tracen Academy.
data.processed:
<story>To become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"― to live up to that dream, 
<story>Special Week had come all the way to Tracen Academy.

data.text:
After a complete victory in her debut race, she 
continued on to challenge her second race but, 
was narrowly defeated and placed second.
data.processed:
<story>After a complete victory in her debut race, she 
<story>continued on to challenge her second race but, 
<story>was narrowly defeated and placed second.

data.text:
Uuuu… Mom said she would be cheering me on 
as she watched on TV. That's why I gave it my all…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Uuuu… Mom said she would be cheering me on 
<story>as she watched on TV. That's why I gave it my all…

data.text: Even with that… I couldn't pull ahead～!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Even with that… I couldn't pull ahead～!!

data.text:
You did your best, didn't you～?! 
You were admirable, Spe-chaaaaan!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>You did your best, didn't you～?! 
<story>You were admirable, Spe-chaaaaan!

data.text:
…Um, if you keep using such loud voices, 
you'll bother the people around us…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>…Um, if you keep using such loud voices, 
<story>you'll bother the people around us…

data.text:
Even so, can you really say this result was unexpected? 
It felt like you were conserving your strength.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Even so, can you really say this result was unexpected? 
<story>It felt like you were conserving your strength.

data.text: Yeah… since it looked like training was really easy for you…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed: <story>Yeah… since it looked like training was really easy for you…

data.text:
In practice, Spe's running ability is not bad. 
That's why I wanted her to enter the race after all.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>In practice, Spe's running ability is not bad. 
<story>That's why I wanted her to enter the race after all.

data.text:
Physical ability, particularly when it comes to clinching a race, 
Chikezo and Brian are top class, but I feel that she has the 
potential to match them.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Physical ability, particularly when it comes to clinching a race, 
<story>Chikezo and Brian are top class, but I feel that she has the 
<story>potential to match them.

data.text:
When it comes to stamina, since she recovers 
quickly after the race is over, I think there 
will be no issues for longer distances.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>When it comes to stamina, since she recovers 
<story>quickly after the race is over, I think there 
<story>will be no issues for longer distances.

data.text:
When it comes to stamina, since she recovers 
quickly after the race is over, I think there 
will be no issues for longer distances.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>When it comes to stamina, since she recovers 
<story>quickly after the race is over, I think there 
<story>will be no issues for longer distances.

data.text: If there's an issue, it's probably experience.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed: <story>If there's an issue, it's probably experience.

data.text: Experience…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Experience…?

data.text:
Before coming to this academy, you had never run with another Uma 
Musume before, right? Running by yourself and running against 
multiple opponents in a race are completely different.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>Before coming to this academy, you had never run with another Uma 
<story>Musume before, right? Running by yourself and running against 
<story>multiple opponents in a race are completely different.

data.text:
Don't expect a conveniently good course or to 
run at a comfortable pace. You need to learn 
how to crush your opponents on the spot.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>Don't expect a conveniently good course or to 
<story>run at a comfortable pace. You need to learn 
<story>how to crush your opponents on the spot.

data.text: That's right! If you gain some experience, you'll be fine!
data.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
data.processed: <story>That's right! If you gain some experience, you'll be fine!

data.text: Yeah, yeah, you've only lost once so far～
data.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
data.processed: <story>Yeah, yeah, you've only lost once so far～

data.text:
Spe, you have us as backup too! If you lose, we'll 
console you with everything we've got so, smash 'em to pieces!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Spe, you have us as backup too! If you lose, we'll 
<story>console you with everything we've got so, smash 'em to pieces!

data.text: …No, smashing them is a little…
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>…No, smashing them is a little…

data.text: But, everyone on the team being with you, is true.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>But, everyone on the team being with you, is true.

data.text:
Spe-chan, let's run together with everyone even more than before. 
If you don't have enough experience, then I'll be your practice 
partner as many times as you want.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Spe-chan, let's run together with everyone even more than before. 
<story>If you don't have enough experience, then I'll be your practice 
<story>partner as many times as you want.

data.text: Suzuka-san…! Everyone…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Suzuka-san…! Everyone…!

data.text:
Alright, starting today we'll put more focus on actual 
race experience! We know what we need to do, so 
there's no time to be looking down, Spe!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Alright, starting today we'll put more focus on actual 
<story>race experience! We know what we need to do, so 
<story>there's no time to be looking down, Spe!

data.text:
Alright, starting today we'll put more focus on actual 
race experience! We know what we need to do, so 
there's no time to be looking down, Spe!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Alright, starting today we'll put more focus on actual 
<story>race experience! We know what we need to do, so 
<story>there's no time to be looking down, Spe!

data.text: Yeah! I can't run while looking down anyways!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah! I can't run while looking down anyways!

data.text:
The promise I made with mom, to become "Japan's #1 
Uma Musume", I'll show you I can do it!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>The promise I made with mom, to become "Japan's #1 
<story>Uma Musume", I'll show you I can do it!

data.text: Uooooooooooh～! Guuuuuuuutss～!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Uooooooooooh～! Guuuuuuuutss～!!

data.text:
As if to blow away all the feelings of being depressed about 
losing, Special Week went dashing down the course.
data.processed:
<story>As if to blow away all the feelings of being depressed about 
<story>losing, Special Week went dashing down the course.

data.text:
That form, she was unchanged from the time when I invited 
her to the team, a genuine and straight-forward runner.
data.processed:
<story>That form, she was unchanged from the time when I invited 
<story>her to the team, a genuine and straight-forward runner.

data.text:
Good work, Special Week-san. 
With this, today's menu is complete.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Good work, Special Week-san. 
<story>With this, today's menu is complete.

data.text:
You did good overcoming this hard training session! 
As expected of me, I was right to put my trust in you!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>You did good overcoming this hard training session! 
<story>As expected of me, I was right to put my trust in you!

data.text:
Haa… haaa… with everyone helping me this much, I felt I 
had to put in at least this much hard work…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Haa… haaa… with everyone helping me this much, I felt I 
<story>had to put in at least this much hard work…!

data.text:
Just like this, let's continue to develop your race intuition. 
Alright, lets finish up with some cooldowns-
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Just like this, let's continue to develop your race intuition. 
<story>Alright, lets finish up with some cooldowns-

data.text:
…Um, Trainer-san. I want to do a little bit more 
training, so can I keep running?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>…Um, Trainer-san. I want to do a little bit more 
<story>training, so can I keep running?

data.text: Hey now, don't you think you're a little too enthusiastic?
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>Hey now, don't you think you're a little too enthusiastic?

data.text: Ehehe… for some reason, I just feel really motivated!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ehehe… for some reason, I just feel really motivated!

data.text:
You see… to tell the truth, I don't really know what I need to 
do to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume."
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>You see… to tell the truth, I don't really know what I need to 
<story>do to become "Japan's #1 Uma Musume."

data.text:
What do I need to do to proudly be able to tell my mom [I became 
Japan's #1]? I've been thinking about it this whole time, but I 
couldn't think of an answer.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>What do I need to do to proudly be able to tell my mom [I became 
<story>Japan's #1]? I've been thinking about it this whole time, but I 
<story>couldn't think of an answer.

data.text:
That's true, "Japan's #1" is just an easy way to 
say it, but it can take many forms, such as having 
a great record or a notable achievement.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>That's true, "Japan's #1" is just an easy way to 
<story>say it, but it can take many forms, such as having 
<story>a great record or a notable achievement.

data.text:
Yeah, but just thinking about it won't get me anywhere so, for 
now I'll take it one step at a time and do my best at what I can!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, but just thinking about it won't get me anywhere so, for 
<story>now I'll take it one step at a time and do my best at what I can!

data.text:
And that's what I realized when I was running together with all 
of you! Probably, I'll get even closer to my goal of becoming 
"Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>And that's what I realized when I was running together with all 
<story>of you! Probably, I'll get even closer to my goal of becoming 
<story>"Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

data.text: To start with, "A Triple Crown Uma Musume"!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>To start with, "A Triple Crown Uma Musume"!!

data.text: That's a huge goal, don't you think?!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed: <story>That's a huge goal, don't you think?!

data.text:
[Satsuki Sho] then the [Derby], and finally [Kika Sho]… 
even winning just one Classic Race is a big deal…
data.name: Rice Shower
data.processed:
<story>[Satsuki Sho] then the [Derby], and finally [Kika Sho]… 
<story>even winning just one Classic Race is a big deal…

data.text:
After winning the Triple Crown, all the interviews 
and things were a pain, though.
data.name: Narita Brian
data.processed:
<story>After winning the Triple Crown, all the interviews 
<story>and things were a pain, though.

data.text: Of course they would! That's just how big of a deal it is!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed: <story>Of course they would! That's just how big of a deal it is!

data.text:
My aim is to become Japan's #1, so I have to be prepared to 
aim for something big like that! Because Hokkaido is Big-kaido!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>My aim is to become Japan's #1, so I have to be prepared to 
<story>aim for something big like that! Because Hokkaido is Big-kaido!

data.text:
A big achievement like the Triple Crown, 
is simple to link to being Japan's #1.
data.processed:
<story>A big achievement like the Triple Crown, 
<story>is simple to link to being Japan's #1.

data.text:
But, considering how big her dream is, 
I think it's a fine goal to focus on.
data.processed:
<story>But, considering how big her dream is, 
<story>I think it's a fine goal to focus on.

data.text:
Of course, with a goal that big, 
half-hearted training won't be sufficient.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Of course, with a goal that big, 
<story>half-hearted training won't be sufficient.

data.text:
Since Spe has decided on her goal, I just need to give 
her my full support. Let's do some additional training!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Since Spe has decided on her goal, I just need to give 
<story>her my full support. Let's do some additional training!

data.text:
Since Spe has decided on her goal, I just need to give 
her my full support. Let's do some additional training!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Since Spe has decided on her goal, I just need to give 
<story>her my full support. Let's do some additional training!

data.text: Yeah! I'll be off!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah! I'll be off!

data.text:
Things are heatin' up aren't they?! 
Hell yeah! I'll be taggin' along too!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Things are heatin' up aren't they?! 
<story>Hell yeah! I'll be taggin' along too!

data.text:
Fufuu… I can certainly see why Trainer-san 
invited Special Week-san to join the team.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu… I can certainly see why Trainer-san 
<story>invited Special Week-san to join the team.

data.text:
Even after having glimpsed the true intensity 
of a real race, Special Week still had an even 
more positive outlook than before.
data.processed:
<story>Even after having glimpsed the true intensity 
<story>of a real race, Special Week still had an even 
<story>more positive outlook than before.

data.text:
Because she has such genuine feelings, 
it makes me strongly desire to support her dream.
data.processed:
<story>Because she has such genuine feelings, 
<story>it makes me strongly desire to support her dream.

data.text:
C'mon Spe! The road to the Triple Crown isn't so forgiving! 
Let's add 50 laps on the dirt course!!
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>C'mon Spe! The road to the Triple Crown isn't so forgiving! 
<story>Let's add 50 laps on the dirt course!!

data.text: 50 laps?! N-No waaaaay～!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>50 laps?! N-No waaaaay～!!

title: I'll Aim For That Big Dream!
